column4: HI I installed the proprietary ati drivers in jaunty abd apparently the card is not supported anymore, I need to revert to the open source drivers (is that what was installed with the distro) and can I use them with tv out?

ati 9600
: hard case, I'm not sure for ope sorce n dual, what works is you can downgrade xorg or even use hardy
: the open source driver least supports dualhed, also :
opensource support separate x screens?
: sorry, seperate screens, generally yes, but the 9600 is the " biggest of the older ones", so not sure for that model
basically I would I have a xorg that would resemble this http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=98456 and substitute whatever the opensource driver is for nvidia geirha

either you get the propi thing from 8.04 to get the config or must now, as I become tired ask again or google your 9600 jaunty dualhead;  you can for sure downgrade xorg and have aticontrolcenter with propitary driver
